description: *User friendly yet powerful, Time=$ enables you to increase profits by tracking your billable time with accuracy and accountability.  *Organize accounts into categories, maintain projects and tasks to provide clients with detailed invoices.  *Create and export work entry reports in CSV format or to Google Docs Spreadsheet. *Alerts to remind you that you are punched in, even with the application is closed.  *Whether you are a small business person or part of a large company, Time=$ will assist you in accounting for your hours and providing professional service.  * Promotional price of $2.99 for a limited time. *Updated to export punch and out times. 6/10/2010
